headings.usage: Main headings, Product Name, Impact text. Uppercase preferred for H1/H2.

usage_rules.background: Use #050505 for the main page background. Never use pure black #000000.
usage_rules.gradients: Avoid full screen gradients. Use radial gradients for 'glow' effects behind the product.
usage_rules.accents: Use #FF4500 sparingly. Only for 'Add to Cart', 'Checkout', and key prices.

layout.grid_system: Bento Grid for features. Asymmetric layouts for marketing sections.
layout.spacing: Generous. Use p-8 to p-24 for sections. Gap-8 for grids.

textures.smoke: Use the smoke image with low opacity (10-20%) and mix-blend-mode: screen over the dark background.
textures.noise: Add a subtle SVG noise overlay fixed to the viewport for film grain effect (opacity 0.03).

effects.glassmorphism: backdrop-blur-xl bg-black/40 border border-white/10 for sticky headers and floating carts.

media.icons: Lucide React (default). Use thin strokes (1.5px) for elegance.

HeroSection.description: Full screen height. Product image centered. 'STRAWBERRY PUNCH' text behind the product in huge Anton font (parallax effect). Smoke texture overlay.

ProductDetails.description: Bento grid layout showing Flavor, Nicotine, Price. 'Add to Cart' sticky bar on mobile.

CartDrawer.description: Slide-out sheet from right. Glassmorphism background. Large product thumbnail.

CheckoutForm.description: Minimalist, step-by-step or single page. High contrast inputs. Orange 'Place Order' button.

AdminDashboard.description: Clean table layout for orders. Status badges (Pending=Yellow, Confirmed=Blue, Completed=Green). Product toggle switch.

AgeVerification.description: Modal on load. 18+ check. Simple 'Yes/No'. No escape.

guidelines.entrance: Stagger children by 0.1s. Fade up + scale (0.95 -> 1).
guidelines.hover: Scale 1.02 for cards. Brightness 1.1 for buttons.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is #EDEDED on dark backgrounds. Muted text #A1A1AA must pass AA.
accessibility.focus: Visible orange ring offset-2 on focus.
accessibility.aria: All interactive elements must have aria-labels if icon-only.

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text.
Ensure the 'Add to Cart' button is always accessible (sticky on mobile).
Use 'sonner' for toast notifications (e.g., 'Added to cart').
Use data-testid for all interactive elements.
